card.name: Abandoned Nuke Silo (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemies can't blow up your machines.
When this base is blown up, put the top card of your arsenal on top of your backup plans.

card.name: Accidental Portal to Hell (MOOK)
card.text: Remove up to two cards from under target blueprint, machine, or base. Then if it's a blueprint and has no cards under it, blow it up.

card.name: Advantage Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your arsenal under this card. Then if this card has 2 or more cards under it, liquidate it and put those cards into your hand.

card.name: Alan Horner, Paleontologist (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 1 mook Unique Operation Scientific Rigor (6) — Exchange up to 2 cards from your hand with that many cards from under one of your blueprints.

card.name: Alien Crash Site (MOOK)
card.text:
Your Scientists get +4.
You can't be targeted by schemes.

card.name: Amassed Production (MOOK)
card.text: Fabricate a number of machines equal to your current turn count or 3, whichever is lower.

card.name: Amber Track, Logistician (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
Unique
The first time one of your mooks is blown up each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ancient Ice Virus Replicator (MOOK)
card.text:
Whenever you fabricate a machine, put the top card of your arsenal under this card. Then, if this card has three or more mooks under it, blow up target mook.
At the start of your turn, if this card has eight machines under it, you win the game.

card.name: Arctic Ice Fortress (MOOK)
card.text: Operations that target you or your mooks at home require an additional mook. Whenever this base is blown up or liquidated, draw a card.

card.name: Armored Mook (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Gets +2 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Assume Another Alias (MOOK)
card.text: Put up to three cards from the top of your backup plans into your hand, then put that many cards from your hand on top of your backup plans.

card.name: Automatic Jumpscare (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, target a mook. It can't start or join operations.

card.name: Average TV Pundit (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever a mook is targeted, it gets -2 until end of turn. Operation Mass Media — Target any number of mooks. For every 3 mooks targeted this way, draw a card.

card.name: Bribe the Guards (MOOK)
card.text: Up to two target mooks can't block until end of turn.

card.name: Bribe World Leaders (MOOK)
card.text:
Whenever you play a scheme, put it under this card instead of into your garbage pile.
At the start of your turn, if this card has eight schemes under it, you win the game.

card.name: Brilliant Tactical Mind (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy plays a scheme, after that scheme resolves, you can blow up this mook. If you do, you can play a scheme from your hand.

card.name: Buff Physicist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever this mook joins or leads an operation, draw a card. Operation Atomic Strength — Put one of your backup plans under target blueprint.

card.name: Cardboard Facade (MOOK)
card.text: If your active base would be blown up, you can blow up this base instead. You can use this ability if this isn't your active base.

card.name: Clockwork Soldier (MOOK)
card.text: This machine can act as an operative with threat level 8.

card.name: Cloning Vat Mishap (MOOK)
card.text: Hire a token mook, then if you have 3 or fewer mooks, hire another one.

card.name: Commit Tax Evasion (MOOK)
card.text: Draw a card, then target mook gets +X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Convenient Accident (MOOK)
card.text: Target mook gets -8 until end of turn.

card.name: Dead Man's Switch (MOOK)
card.text:
Play this only when one of your unique mooks is blown up.
Blow up target mook, base, or machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Deadly Neurotoxin (MOOK)
card.text: Mooks get -4 from poison until end of turn.

card.name: Death Metal Bard (MOOK)
card.text: Your other mooks at home get +3.

card.name: Death Ray (MOOK)
card.text:
At the start of your turn, put the top card of your arsenal under this card.
At the end of your turn, if this card has three or more cards under it, put them all into your garbage pile. If you do, blow up any target.

card.name: Deepweb Search (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for a mook with threat level 5 or less, or a machine, and put it into your hand. Then, toss two cards from the top of your arsenal.

card.name: Defenestrate (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target unique mook or target mook with threat level 8 or higher.

card.name: Demolitions Expert (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, until end of turn, your schemes can target mooks and machines that can't be targeted.
Static: Once per turn, whenever one of your mooks is blown up by an ability, you can blow up target mook with a lower threat level.

card.name: Digital Watchtower (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an opponent plays a scheme, you can liquidate this base to stop it.

card.name: Discount Quantum Singularity (MOOK)
card.text:
Unique
This machine counts toward one requirement of any type.
The first time you hire a mook that has a requirement during each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Do Not Fail Me (MOOK)
card.text: Target mook gains Lone Operative until end of turn. (It can lead any of your operations by itself)

card.name: Drafting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, you can blow up this machine instead. If you do, search your arsenal for a blueprint and play it, then shuffle.

card.name: Dragon Cosplayer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, put the top two cards of your arsenal under it.
This mook gets +2 for each card under it.

card.name: Drone Pilot (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 2 machines
Whenever you start an operation, hire a token mook.

card.name: Encourage Forest Fires (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard or liquidate a mook as a cost.
Blow up target base, then draw a card.

card.name: Enhanced Employee (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
You can play a second scheme each turn.

card.name: Escape Pods (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you would take a backup plan, you can liquidate this machine instead.

card.name: Evil Doctor (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a blueprint from your arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, hire two token mooks.
Static: Whenever you hire one or more token mooks, you hire that many plus one instead.

card.name: Evil Supercomputer (MOOK)
card.text: You can play an extra scheme each turn.

card.name: Experimental Portal Donation (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard two cards as a cost. Draw two cards.
When you take this scheme as a backup plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Exponential Scheme (MOOK)
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your arsenal. Put all the schemes among those cards into your hand, and toss the rest. You can play another scheme this turn.

card.name: Fake Your Death (MOOK)
card.text: Put a card from your hand on top of your backup plans.

card.name: Finn Dorset, Hired Biologist (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 4 mooks
Unique
Whenever another of your nontoken mooks is blown up, hire a token mook.

card.name: Flagbearer Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy targets one of your mooks, you can change the target to this mook. If you do, it gets +2 until end of turn.

card.name: Forest Treehouse (MOOK)
card.text:
You can't fabricate machines unless you discard a card as a cost.
Your Mooks get +2 while at home.
Your operatives can't be targeted by enemies.

card.name: Freelance Reporter (MOOK)
card.text:
Your mooks can't be targeted by schemes.
Whenever you take a backup plan, you can discard that card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gas Mask Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison. Operation Onion Cloud (6) — Target mook gets -4 from poison until end of turn.

card.name: General Gruff, Tactician (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 3 mooks, 1 machine Unique Operation Explosive Raid (30) — Target enemy takes a backup plan. If they have an active base, blow it up. If not, blow up one of their target mooks.

card.name: Generic Radicalist (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, target player tosses the top three cards of their arsenal.

card.name: Genetic Experiment Vat (MOOK)
card.text: As a reaction, you can liquidate this machine and a mook as a cost. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a mook. Hire the revealed mook, ignoring its requirements, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your arsenal in any order.

card.name: Ghost Gun Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: As a reaction, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, target mook gets +7 until end of turn. Operation Third World Factory — Blow up target enemy operative.

card.name: Gifted Programmer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, fabricate a machine.
When you take this mook as a backup plan, you can reveal it to hire it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gifted Tactician (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, if one or more of your mooks would be blown up by an ability, they gain invincible until end of turn.
Static: After an enemy you're assaulting chooses defenders, you can remove up to one of your attackers from combat.

card.name: Guerilla Fighter (MOOK)
card.text: When you take this mook as a backup plan, you can reveal it to hire it. When this mook onboards this way, hire a token mook.

card.name: Hack the Mainframe (MOOK)
card.text: Target player reveals their hand, then discards all schemes and blueprints among them.

card.name: Hacked Lucky Cat (MOOK)
card.text: The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top card of your arsenal. You can toss that card. Then draw a card.

card.name: Hamster Treadmill (MOOK)
card.text:
When you fabricate this machine, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.
This machine can act as an operative with threat level 2. When it joins an operation this way, draw a card.

card.name: Hand Out RPGs (MOOK)
card.text: Until end of turn, your mooks have Operation Roll For Initiative (8) — Blow up target machine.

card.name: Haunted Castle (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine each turn. When you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hazmat Trooper (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison, disease, and radiation.

card.name: Helicopter Pilot (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Rescue Chopper — Bring home all of your operatives not on this operation.

card.name: High-Powered Hologram Projector (MOOK)
card.text: Your active base can't be targeted. You can't change your active base except with abilities. Operation Move Out — Change your active base to one of your other bases.

card.name: Hire Contractor (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires turn 3 or later
Hire a mook from your hand, ignoring its requirements.

card.name: Hold for Ransom (MOOK)
card.text:
Put this card under target enemy mook and steal it. It can't start or join operations or use any abilities.
Whenever its owner would draw a card, they can have you draw two cards instead. If they do, put this card in the garbage pile and this ability ends.

card.name: HR Representative (MOOK)
card.text: Mooks in your hand have -1 to each of their requirements.

card.name: Hulking Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 2 mooks Operation Break Stuff (30) — Target player takes a backup plan unless they liquidate 2 mooks.

card.name: Human Resources HQ (MOOK)
card.text:
You can liquidate mooks instead of other card types to pay costs.
Whenever you liquidate one or more mooks to pay a cost, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a mook. Put it into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Indomitable Mook (MOOK)
card.text: This mook has threat level 6.

card.name: Industrial Wasp Nest (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, target mook gets -2 until end of turn for each card you drew.

card.name: Influencer for Hire (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, target player reveals their hand and each of their facedown cards. Operation Viral Post — Each enemy discards a card. Put the top card of your arsenal on top of your backup plans.

card.name: Intern Engineer (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, put the top card of your arsenal under target blueprint.

card.name: Invest in Crypto (MOOK)
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your arsenal. Hire one as a token mook, put one into your hand, and toss the last one.

card.name: Island Skull Base (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemies can't target your blueprints or mooks.
Operations can't target you unless they have total threat level 30 or more.

card.name: Ivan Ivanovich, Assassin (MOOK)
card.text: Unique Lone Operative (This mook can lead any of your operations by itself). Operation Polonium Tea (8) — Blow up target operative.

card.name: Kid's Science Museum (MOOK)
card.text:
Your Scientists get +2.
Once per turn, when one of your Scientists is targeted, you can change that target to a mook that isn't yours.
When an enemy blows up this base, they reveal their hand and you choose a card from it. They discard that card.

card.name: Lab Rat Escape (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine or target facedown card.

card.name: Labcoat Distributor (MOOK)
card.text: Your mooks are also scientists.

card.name: Lasergun Enforcer (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 1 machine Your other Lasergun Enforcers get +2. Operation Laser Level — For each Lasergun Enforcer in this operation, blow up target base or machine.

card.name: Manipulative Chatbot (MOOK)
card.text: Onboarding abilities of mooks you onboard trigger twice.

card.name: Master Engineer (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a Blueprint from your arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, you can fabricate three additional machines this turn.
Static: The first time one of your machines is blown up by an ability each turn, you can put that card on top of your backup plans faceup.

card.name: Metal Fist Bruiser (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 2 mooks
When this mook starts or joins an operation, it gets +1 for each of your machines and -1 for each of the defending player's machines.

card.name: Minigun Mook (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
While this mook is at home, whenever you're targeted by an operation, this mook gets +4 until end of turn. Then blow up the operatives with threat level equal to or lower than this mook's.

card.name: Minion Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text:
Once per turn, whenever you hire a nontoken mook, hire a token mook.
Your tokens mooks have Threat Level 3.

card.name: Mook Lobbyist (MOOK)
card.text: Operation I Need Your Support (5) — Look at the top card of your arsenal. If it's a scheme, put it into your hand.

card.name: Mook Mastermind (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 6 or more schemes in your garbage pile or under your blueprints Unique Operation Plan To Take Over The World — Reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a scheme. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Mook Teamlead (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +2 for each of your other mooks. Operation Dine In (12) — Take a backup plan, then for each backup plan you've taken this turn, blow up target mook.

card.name: Mook Technician (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.

card.name: Mook Telemarketer (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, draw a card unless an enemy discards a card.

card.name: Moon Base (MOOK)
card.text:
Operations can't target you unless they have 3 or fewer operatives.
Enemies can't target your machines or facedown cards.

card.name: Napol Eon, Master Bombardier (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 2 bases Unique Operation Cannon Barrage (12) — Blow up target base.

card.name: Nautical Station (MOOK)
card.text: Enemies can't target you.

card.name: Octopus Trainer (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemy mooks have +1 to each of their requirements.
Whenever you hire a nontoken mook, you can discard a card. If you do, hire a token mook.

card.name: Outsource Violence (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires turn 3 or later
Hire three token mooks.

card.name: Petty Larceny (MOOK)
card.text: Choose target enemy and name a card type. They reveal the top three cards of their arsenal. For each card of the chosen type revealed this way, draw a card. They toss those cards.

card.name: Plan Ahead (MOOK)
card.text:
Draw two cards.
If you take this scheme as a backup plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately. If you play it this way, draw a card.

card.name: Power Plant (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine during each of your turns.

card.name: Psychic Experiments (MOOK)
card.text: Toss the top three cards of your arsenal, then put the top card of your arsenal on top of your backup plans.

card.name: Queen of Criminality (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 2 mooks, 2 machines
Unique
At the end of your turn, any player can discard a card. If no one does, blow up target machine and draw a card.

card.name: Quickdraw Cowboy (MOOK)
card.text:
Unique
This mook can't be blown up.

card.name: Racecar Mechanic (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Pit Maneuver (6) — Reveal the top card of your arsenal. If it's a machine, play it facedown. If not, toss it.

card.name: Reveal Conspiracy (MOOK)
card.text: Target enemy shuffles their hand into their arsenal, then reveals that many cards plus two from the top. Separate the cards into two piles. They choose one pile and put it into their hand, then toss the other.

card.name: Rocket Trooper (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Whenever an opponent starts an operation, this mook gets +8 until end of turn. Then, you can blow up target operative with equal or lower threat level.

card.name: Ron Jambo (MOOK)
card.text: Requires turn 3 or later Unique Operation Between Blood (8) — Blow up target mook. If that mook was an operative, blow up another target mook or target base. If not, that mook's player takes a backup plan.

card.name: Satellite Backup (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, put it under another machine. If you do, whenever that machine would be blown up, send this card to the garbage pile instead.

card.name: Scale Down (MOOK)
card.text: Each player liquidates a mook, base, or machine.

card.name: Scavenge for Parts (MOOK)
card.text: Toss cards from the top of your arsenal until you find a machine card. Put that card into your hand.

card.name: Scour the Sands (MOOK)
card.text:
Liquidate a mook as a cost. Blow up target machine.
When you take this scheme as a backup plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Scout Platform (MOOK)
card.text: Enemies play with the top card of their arsenal revealed.

card.name: Secret Agent Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Unique Lone Operative (This mook can lead any of your operations by itself) Operation Die Another Day — Remove a card from under target blueprint, machine, or mook.

card.name: Self Destruct (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when you're targeted for an operation.
Blow up target operative. Draw a card.

card.name: Skilled Therapist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever one of your mooks becomes the target of an ability, you can return that mook to your hand.

card.name: Sleep with the Fishes (MOOK)
card.text: Target player liquidates their mook with the lowest threat level.

card.name: Small Hadron Collider (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can liquidate this machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target machine or base.

card.name: Sniper Jezail (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Enemy At The Gate (8) — Blow up target mook with threat level less than or equal to the total threat level of this operation.

card.name: Social Engineering Major (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, steal target machine.

card.name: Sorting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, look at the top three cards of your arsenal and put them back in any order.

card.name: Spec Ops Agent (MOOK)
card.text: Operation Silent Stop (10) — Target enemy reveals their hand, then discards a scheme.

card.name: Spy Plane (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you target an enemy with an operation, you can look at one of their facedown cards, then flip this machine facedown.

card.name: Steal Inheritance (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard a card as a cost.
Draw three cards.

card.name: Strategic Genius (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, if you've got no cards in your hand, draw three cards.
Static: Your mooks get +1 for each nontoken mook you've hired this turn.

card.name: Study the Enemy (MOOK)
card.text: Name a card type, then target enemy reveals the top three cards of their arsenal and you draw a card for each revealed card of that type. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Super Villain (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a Blueprint from your arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, the next scheme you play this turn has no costs and can't be stopped. Static: Whenever another player plays a scheme or starts an operation that targets one or more of your blueprints, draw a card.

card.name: Suspicious Solar Flare (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up every machine. You can't fabricate machines until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Test Experimental Weapon (MOOK)
card.text:
Liquidate a machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target mook.
When you take this scheme as a backup plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Thief Mook (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook returns home for the first time each turn, draw a card. Operation The Big One — Target opponent takes a backup plan and reveals it. If it's a scheme, you can play it. If it's a mook, you can hire it. If it's a machine, you can put it facedown.

card.name: Threaten Endangered Animals (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for up to three machines. Choose one of them in secret and put it facedown. After you shuffle, put the rest on top in any order.

card.name: Tie To The Train Tracks (MOOK)
card.text: Steal target mook until your next turn, or until it's targeted by an enemy operation. As long as it's yours, it can't become an operative and your other mooks can't be targeted.

card.name: Twinned Siblings (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, hire a token mook.

card.name: Underwater Bubble Dome (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can liquidate a machine. If you do, draw a card. Operation Rolling Blackout — Flip a number of machines facedown up to the number of operatives.

card.name: Unethical Head Hunter (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, you can reveal the top five cards of your arsenal. If you do, put a mook from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Unguarded Shark Tank (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy starts an operation, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, stop that operation, and that player can't start any more operations this turn.

card.name: Unlicensed Disintegration (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine, then draw a card. Then discard a card if it wasn't your machine.

card.name: Unstoppable Giant Robot (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, put one of your machines under this blueprint. Then, if this card has six or more machines under it, it becomes a mook with Threat Level 32, and has "When this mook assaults successfully, the defending player loses the game."

card.name: Vaccination Conspiracist (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to Scientists Operation Do Your Own Research — Scientists get -2 until end of turn for each operative.

card.name: Villainous Lapcat (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you would take a backup plan, you can put this card on top of your backup plans faceup instead. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: WMD Enthusiast (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, blow up every mook. Until end of turn, whenever a mook onboards, it's blown up by radiation.

card.name: Wonder Hunter (MOOK)
card.text: Your Scientists get +2. Your operatives can't be targeted by schemes or mooks. Operation It Belongs In A Museum (6) — Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: You Got It Boss (MOOK)
card.text: Until end of turn, target mook can start any of your operations and operations that mook starts or joins can't be stopped.
